name: Gum Factory
description:
Howdy friend! 

I'm happy to welcome you to our humble home. Please make yourself comfortable while waiting for the calling. It hopefully won't take long now.

The calling? Well, when the Great One desires to consume our bodies the bells will ring, opening the exit and calling for us to sacrifice. Oh, what a joyful day it will be!

May the Great One feed upon our bodies!

PS: Stuck? Try seeing if anyone has anything new to say after finding relevant info. If you are still stuck, check the Walkthrough available for download.
